About our VPS
All VM's are backed up weekly with copies stored on and off-site. We offer cPanel as a semi-managed service, meaning we will
take care of your server, you take care of your code. All nodes, OpenVZ or Xen, are at minimum dual quad core CPU with raid10
arrays. Location is Rock Hill SC
